organizations.name: UN
quotes: he gave an order to all the UN organizations that anything I asked for would come as priority, because what I was doing was not just for Timor, it was for the UN too.

roles.title: Sergio de Mello’s administrative person
quotes: he sent his administrative person and he came out and the message was whatever I wanted I get it.
She actually rung up the printer in Adelaide and stopped them.
truckloads [of pamphlets] left Adelaide to Darwin.
I need it to go to Darwin and get all the books.
truckloads [of pamphlets] left Adelaide to Darwin.
When they arrived [in Dili] they went to all the districts to be distributed and then we got our copies for the donor’s conference and we pulled it off.
